name: FINALE!
description:
It's never too late to tell people how you feel about them! Even when you can't talk. Or you're at the final boss of the RPG.

Use your drumming skills to change the fate of your party.

FINALE was made for the Game Maker's Toolkit game jam, between Friday, 14th of July and Sunday, 16th of July.

It was made using RPG Maker MV by Kadokawa/Yoji Ojima.

Some SFX by Enterbrain.

The following RPG Maker plugins were used:

  • Core Engine
  • Battle Core Engine
  • Target Core
  • Selection Control
  • Message Core & Extended Message Pack 1

 by http://yanfly.moe/

  • Walk Battle Characters

by http://sumrndm.site/

All remaining visual & audio assets, scripting and writing by Toadheart.
